description: Create /admin/settlement-workflow page displaying the 9-step settlement process: 1) Period selection, 2) Supplier/franchisee file status, 3) Send report requests button, 4) Send reminders button, 5) File processing and cross-referencing, 6) Gap handling, 7) Commission calculation, 8) Final approval, 9) Invoice report generation. Include quick action buttons for each step and visual progress indicators.
title: Settlement Workflow Page
